step_feedback.feedback: Good start! Keep your shoulders relaxed and maintain a comfortable posture.
Nice stretch overhead. Ensure your fingers are spread wide to engage your hand.
Great job making a fist and squeezing your shoulder blades. Remember to inhale as you tighten.
Excellent exhale and relaxation. Focus on a smooth return to the starting position.
You're doing well! Ensure a full stretch overhead and a controlled movement.
Second rep is looking good. Maintain that comfortable posture and relaxed shoulders.
Keep up the good work with the overhead stretch and open fingers.
Excellent fist and shoulder blade squeeze. Remember to breathe in as you tighten your muscles.
Well done on the exhale and relaxation. Focus on controlled movement back up.
Fantastic finish to the second rep! You're effectively building strength and promoting drainage.

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with the Push Down Pumping exercise! Remember to keep your fingers spread wide when stretching overhead and to inhale as you make a fist and squeeze your shoulder blades. Continue with controlled movements for effective lymph drainage.
